name: 1-Bit Hero
description:
Retro junkies, platform fanatics and game enthusiasts in general, rejoice!
In 1-Bit Hero, you take the role of an unnamed hero who can't stand still. Featuring unique gameplay mechanics and graphics that are about as retro as it gets.

- Time.com: "Give 1-Bit Hero a shot - it takes a lot of courage to go back to square one and put out a game that evokes an entire lost generation of entertainment."
- toucharcade.com : "Mobile-friendly gameplay and great balance of challenge and playability."
- indiegamemag.com : "Featuring a pumping chiptune soundtrack and classic, platform gameplay with unique twists, 1-Bit Hero is bound to make the retro gamer rejoice and give newcomers a new taste of olden day gaming greatness."
- appadvice.com : "The visuals take me back to my childhood, the chiptunes bring a smile to my face, and the controls are fantastic for a platformer."

Features :
- Extremely retro graphics
- Platform gameplay with a unique twist
- Journey through 20 brutally unpredictable levels
- Awesome chiptunes soundtrack
- Universal App; play on both iPhone and iPad
- Game Center Leaderboards & Achievements
- Social network sharing: Share to Facebook & Twitter
- Record and share game replay

How to play :
- Tap left to make the hero turn around
- Tap right to make the hero jump
- Don't die

Owned and published by Macrobean Entertainment Inc. Developed in collaboration with Mudloop.
